item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 19, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. How Fast the Days Are Getting Longer (70 points | 6 comments)

22. Solar Generation Surge Sends European Power Prices Below Zero (27 points | 35 comments)
23. Visualising data structures and algorithms through animation (214 points | 10 comments)
24. Show HN: I made a tool to port tweets to Bluesky mantaining their original date (478 points | 184 comments)
25. Google to buy Wiz for $32B (565 points | 745 comments)
26. Zest: a programming language for malleable and legible systems (34 points | 6 comments)
27. Apple Loses Top Court Fight Over German Antitrust Crackdown (108 points | 28 comments)
